For all its flaws, this game is still fun to play from time to time. As an Asymmetrical Multiplayer game, balance is always going to be an issue, but I feel as though this game is not too far off. We can only wait (and hope) that with continued updates, we will get a more balanced product in the long run.

My word of advise for all players, new and old, please play both sides. It seems like most of the toxicity in the community is caused by those that only dwell on one side of the fence and do not know the plight of the other.
Bem feito sendo um jogo de terror, com muitos personagens... e o melhor de tudo, da pra jogar com amigos, recomendo

This game has bugs, exploits and glitches but the dev team has been working hard since release to fix them and attempt to balance the game.  Ive been playing since the release of huntress and this game has seen major changes which I think merits a "Pretty good job so far" but has a way to go before it's perfect.  Then again, no game is ever perfect in the eyes of a true developer.  In game or post game might be contradictory to what I'm about to say but this game does truly have an amazing community, from the fan art to fog whisperers to the dev team itself.  This game is alive and strong because of the community to support it.

I do enjoy the current "questing" system.  The archives awards bloodpoints (BP), in-game currency, for performing specific tasks while in the arena either as the killer or survivor.   BP can be a grind to obtain netting about 10-25k BP per game usually lasting 10-25min.  This doesn't sound bad but to prestige a character, you'll need about 1 million BP.  Also the max amount of BP you obtain in a single category is 8k which really harms people with a specific play style. An easy fix would be to remove the cap on bp limits or add an additional category that only receives BP when you reach the max bp of the main category.  

I'd like to go much more in depth but I'd be writing an epic on the pros and cons of this game.  If you want more of my opinion of the good, the bad and what to improve I'll gladly write another review in the future.  ~RD

朋友们好啊，我是混元形意修电门掌门人马比尔。刚才有个朋友问我，比尔老师发生甚么事了，我说怎么回事，给我发了几张截图我一看！嗷！原来是佐田，有两个年轻人，三十多岁，一个体重，九十多公斤（指老迈），一个体重八十多公斤（指鬼面），塔门说，唉…有一个说是我在春木镇练守尸颈椎练坏了，马老师你能不能教教我浑元功法，矮…帮助治疗一下，我的颈椎病。我说可以。我说你在春木镇练死守儿，不好用，他不服气。我说小朋友：你两个蓄力刀来折我一个钢筋，他折不动。他说你这也没用。我说我这个有用，这是化劲儿，传统功夫是讲化劲儿的四两拨千金。二百多斤的英国大力士（指小丑），都握不动我这一个手指头（笑。啊…哈！他说要和我试试，我说可以。诶…我一说他 啪 就站起来了，很快啊！然后上来就是一个左倒车一个右藏红光一个左封窗，我全部防出去，防出去了啊，防出去以后自然是传统功夫以点到为止，右拳（右手的紫光剑）放到他鼻子上没打他，我笑一下准备收拳，因为这时间，以传统功夫的点到为止他已经输了，如果这一拳发力，一拳就把他鼻子打骨折了（指闪瞎屠夫），放在鼻子上没有打他，他也承认，我先打到他面部。他不知道拳放在他鼻子上，他承认我先打到他面部，啊，我收拳的时间不打了，他突然袭击（吸满了）左红处来打我脸，啊，我大意了啊，没有闪，哎…他的左拳("危险")给我眼，啊，右眼，蹭了一下，但没关系啊！他也说，啊他截图也说了，两分多钟以后，当时流眼泪了，捂着眼，我说婷婷。然后两分钟以后，两分多钟以后诶就好了（指拔线cd转好了），我说小伙子你不讲武德你不懂，他说比尔老师对不对不起，我不懂规矩。啊，我是…他说他是乱打的，他可不是乱打的啊，倒车藏光左封窗，训练有素，后来他说他练了三四年满红配，啊，看来是有bear来！这两个年轻人不讲武德，来骗，来偷吸，我六十九岁的老比尔，这好吗？这不好，我劝这位年轻人耗子尾汁，好好反思，以后不要再犯这样的聪明，小聪明，啊，呃…杀鸡要以和为贵，要讲武德，不要搞红处红配件，谢谢朋友们！

Apesar de eu não ter muitas horas nessa conta, já jogo o game tem um bom tempo. É bem divertido para se jogar com os amigos, mas sem dúvida ele possui vários problemas como:
Diversos bugs horríveis - O game conta com vários bugs, alguns insuportáveis que chega a desanimar continuar jogando, um bom exemplo é o hitbox do assassino, esse é o pior bug de todo o jogo. Esse bug está no game tem muito tempo e até hoje não consertaram, e esse não é o único.
Falta de atendimento da equipe de suporte - Nós jogadores lidamos com muitos problemas e bugs durante o jogo, a equipe ou não dá bola, ou demora muito tempo pra corrigir um simples bug.
Comunidade tóxica - A comunidade desse jogo é terrível, boa parte dela é muito tóxica, principalmente os sobreviventes, pra quem ta começando o jogo como killer e se deparar com jogadores tóxicos assim, é algo de desanimar. Claro que alguns são exceção.
Tirando isso e outros problemas, o jogo é bom, ele vem com atualizações frequentes de novos killers, perks, etc. Recomendo, mas é importante pensar nesses contras antes de comprar, para não acabar arrependendo.

I bought this game a long time ago, but i barely played it at the time. Decided to give it a try like 4 years later and to be honest at the start i regretted not playing before. 

But this was only when i cameback to it. As i played more and understood more the game, it started to become more and more annoying.

I usually play killer, which means i go against 4 survivors. The thing is the matchmaking is totally randomized, i am a new player with absolutly 0 perks or 1 that i already managed to farm. 0 lvl killers besides clown and leatherface, which makes me start a game with 1 perk and no add ons. Every single game i go i face for guys purple or red ranks (best ranks in game), and they always have the same fcking perks. Decisive strike, borrowed time, sprint burst, and a variation of either balance landing or 2 other perks.

Like the skill gap from those player aint enough to my level, i still have to face the op perks. Every single game, the ratio of a fair game to an unbalanced one is like 1 fair game for 30 unbalanced ones. 

Of course some people will say, perks dont affect much the game, you just have to focus on playing better, blabla, of course thats true. But why, does a new player like me have to face rank 1's from the start? why do i buy a dlc, freddy's and i go try him out at lvl 1 and have to face that? Come on, i know having a good matchmaking is the problem for every competitive game but this one is the worst i have experienced by far.

Today, I just played 3 games, the first 1 was going kinda of ok, until the ds's start activating and then when all were on last hook they had a key all escaped thro the hatch, all 4 were red ranks. i got so triggered i totally sucked on the other 2, but like it wouldnt make any difference as the matches were exactly the same, lvl 1-10 freddy against red ranks again. i dont even have a away to reset gens...

Basically for new player the game is just pure frustration, i am pretty sure that player that have a lot of hours in the game, it is fun and all, but even so red rank facing a new killer must also be boring for them. The game has everything to be good, the matchmaking ruins it all tbh. If they fix this i am changing my review to positive, until then, stays negative and i wont advise my friend to buy it until they change this.

Hope i could help...

Ну что, наиграл я в эту игру уже две с половиной "К" часов, и как не странно я всё ещё её рекомендую _) За это время, игра не стала скучной или нудной, если только за выживших. За сторону убийц, играть всегда интересно. Особенно против хороших игроков, а не "упоранотов" которые за три минуты дают пять генов. Но я не сужу, нравится так играть ради бога _) Да и с выходом нового мана, "Художницы" видно что разработчики наконец видят эту проблемы. Может и на нашей стороне выглянет солнце, а не только выжившим все плюшки. В общем игра отличная, играйте и получайте только хорошие эмоции. Добро пожаловать в туман... _)

キラーはそれを阻止します。
